text: Hector Wegmann (died 1589) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Auxiliary Bishop of Passau (1575–1589)."Bishop Hector Wegmann" Catholic- Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved July 24, 2016"Diocese of Passau" Catholic-Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved February 29, 2016"Diocese of Passau" GCatholic.org. Gabriel Chow. Retrieved February 29, 2016 ==Biography== On 4 Jul 1575, Hector Wegmann was appointed during the papacy of Pope Gregory XIII as Auxiliary Bishop of Passau and Titular Bishop of Symbalia. He served as Auxiliary Bishop of Passau until his death on 31 Jan 1589. == See also == *Catholic Church in Germany == References == Category:16th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Gregory XIII Category:1589 deaths
title: Hector Wegmann
